bug.author: marcoabreu
bug.summary: Bullet points on website are not separated by new lines
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>Description</denchmark-h>
On <denchmark-link:https://mxnet.apache.org/versions/1.6/api/faq/security.html>https://mxnet.apache.org/versions/1.6/api/faq/security.html</denchmark-link> the bullet point list does not get separated into newlines <denchmark-h:h3>Error Message</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/18629099/92314122-fd98aa00-efd3-11ea-9567-bf49f825d59f.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment:
Fixed in latest 1.7.0 and master website <denchmark-link:https://mxnet.apache.org/versions/1.7.0/api/faq/security.html>https://mxnet.apache.org/versions/1.7.0/api/faq/security.html</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://mxnet.apache.org/versions/master/api/faq/security.html>https://mxnet.apache.org/versions/master/api/faq/security.html</denchmark-link>
